thread.title: Cubs SS Russell ruled out for NLCS with hamstring injury
thread.title_full: Cubs SS Russell ruled out for NLCS with hamstring injury

title: Cubs SS Russell ruled out for NLCS with hamstring injury
text:
> Sports Cubs SS Russell ruled out for NLCS with hamstring injury Chicago Cubs first baseman Anthony Rizzo, left, and center fielder Dexter Fowler, right, talk during a workout in preparation for Game 1 of baseball's National League Championship Series in Chicago, Thursday, Oct. 15, 2015. (AP Photo/David Banks)
